WorkItem.Description:
From thread:
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=61103
 
When a worksheet name contains !, extractSheetTitle fails.  This causes issues with named ranges since it uses this call.
 
$pRange = 'Hi! There'!A1
 
$reference = explode('!', $pRange);
 
range[0] = 'Hi
 
range[1] = There'
 
range[2] = J3
 
expected range[0] = 'Hi! There'
 
range[1] = j3
WorkItem.Summary: extractSheetTitle fails when sheet title contains exclamation mark (!)
